title: Carl's Jr. adds more Beyond Meat to the menu with Beyond BBQ cheeseburger
text: Fast-food chain Carl's Jr. announced a partnership with Beyond Meat Inc. BYND, -2.39% on Tuesday that will bring the plant-based Beyond BBQ cheeseburger to menus starting October 9 and priced at $6.29. The Beyond BBQ cheeseburger ingredients will include American cheese, crispy onion rings, and Carl's Jr.'s BBQ sauce. Carl's Jr. introduced the plant-based Beyond Famous Star burger to the menu in December 2018, selling 4.5 million since the launch. Beyond Meat stock has fallen 7.4% over the past three months while the S&P 500 index SPX, -1.35% has slipped 1.3% for the period.
